<p align="center">
  <a href="http://www.bibtex-tidy.tech/">http://www.bibtex-tidy.tech/</a>
</p>



A tool for cleaning and formatting BibTeX files.

## Features
- Standardize author names
- Merge duplicate entries
- Sort and align fields
- Remove specified fields
- And more...
